text: Hey, look. She came to school with no pants on!

speaker: Fear
text: Called it!

speaker: Joy
text: Ready?

speaker: Sadness
text: I don't think this happy thing is going to work. But if we scare her.

speaker: Joy
text: Just follow my lead. Here we go. Bark, bark, bark, bark.

speaker: Dream Director
text: Who is that?

speaker: Fear
text: Uh, what's going on?

speaker: Dream Director
text: They're trying to wake her up. Call security.

speaker: Bing Bong
text: Hi, Riley. It's me.

speaker: Fear
text: Bing Bong?

speaker: Joy
text: Sadness, you are ruining this dream. You're scaring her.

speaker: Sadness
text: But look, it's working.

speaker: Dream Director
text: They're not part of this dream. Get them.

speaker: Dream Director
text: They're not part of this dream. Get them.

speaker: Subconscious Guard Frank
text: Stop right there!

speaker: Dream Director
text: Pan away. Pan away.

speaker: Fear
text: Boo! Pick a Pot line.

speaker: Bing Bong
text: You can't do this. I know people in Headquarters.

speaker: Joy
text: No, no, no, no, no, no! There go the core memories.

speaker: Bing Bong
text: Not in there. I'm scared of the dark, please!

speaker: Joy
text: Come on. What is this place?

speaker: Sadness
text: The subconscious. It's where they take all the troublemakers.

speaker: Subconscious Guard Frank
text: My hat feels loose.

speaker: Joy
text: How do we get in?

speaker: Subconscious Guard Dave
text: Let me see.

speaker: Subconscious Guard Frank
text: Have you got my hat or is that your hat?

speaker: Subconscious Guard Dave
text: Yeah, it's my hat.

speaker: Subconscious Guard Frank
text: You sure?

speaker: Subconscious Guard Dave
text: I don't know.

speaker: Subconscious Guard Frank
text: Look at the label.

speaker: Subconscious Guard Dave
text: Yeah, it says my hat.

speaker: Subconscious Guard Frank
text: Wait. It says "my hat"?

speaker: Subconscious Guard Dave
text: "My hat", it says.

speaker: Subconscious Guard Frank
text: That's what I wrote in my hat.

speaker: Subconscious Guard Dave
text: What are you talking about?

speaker: Subconscious Guard Frank
text: Look. You've got my hat on.

speaker: Subconscious Guard Dave
text: Okay, it's my hat.

speaker: Subconscious Guard Frank
text: Hey, you!

speaker: Sadness
text: Oh, you caught us.

speaker: Subconscious Guard Dave
text: Get back in there. No escaping.

speaker: Sadness
text: Oh. I don't like it here. It's where they keep Riley's darkest fears.

speaker: Joy
text: It's broccoli.

speaker: Sadness
text: The stairs to the biggest smite.

speaker: Joy
text: Grandma's vacuum cleaner! Bing Bong.

speaker: Bing Bong
text: Joy?

speaker: Joy
text: There you are.

speaker: Bing Bong
text: Shhh.

speaker: Joy
text: It's Jangles. Do you have the core memories?

speaker: Bing Bong
text: Yeah. All he cared about was the candy.

speaker: Bing Bong
text: We're outta here. Let's get to that train.

speaker: Joy
text: Wait. The train is not running. We still have to wake up Riley.

speaker: Sadness
text: But how?

speaker: Bing Bong
text: Oh, no.

speaker: Joy
text: Hey, Sadness. Did you hear about the party they were having?

speaker: Sadness
text: Yeah. Yes, Joy. Isn't it a b-b-birthday party?

speaker: Jangles
text: Did you say birthday?

speaker: Joy
text: And there's going to be cake and presents.

speaker: Sadness
text: And games and balloons.

speaker: Jangles
text: A birthday!

speaker: Joy
text: Okay. Follow us. Nothing like a good scare to wake you up, right?

speaker: Subconscious Guard Dave
text: Okay, it's my hand writing.

speaker: Subconscious Guard Frank
text: No, it isn't. It's my hat, I wrote that.

speaker: Subconscious Guard Dave
text: No, but this one's my hat.

speaker: Disgust
text: What is going on?

speaker: Anger
text: He did it again.

speaker: Fear
text: We were at school, and we were naked and there was a dog. The back half was.was chasing it, and there was a Bing Bong!

speaker: Anger
text: You idiot. It was a dream! This is ridiculous. We can't even get a good night sleep anymore. Time to take action. Stupid Mom and Dad. If they hadn't moved us none of this would have happened. Who's with me?

speaker: Fear
text: Um, um, um, um. No, no, no, no.

speaker: Disgust
text: Yeah. Let's do it.

speaker: Anger
text: She took it. There's no turning back.

speaker: Disgust
text: So how are we going to get to Minnesota from here?

speaker: Anger
text: Well, why don't we go down to the elephant lot and rent an elephant?
